title: So Anivia
body:
Since when does having anivia == not being able to push against her. 

I don't remember this being in the patch notes.

replies.body:
what?

That has literally always been Anivia's strongest point.

Thats why when wave-clear meta is a thing she is so damn strong, like with Ziggs or Lux.

A good Anivia makes pushing basically impossible.

No, no. We won the game, it just took an extra 10 minutes to split push around her wave clearing.

Since I am an Anivia main, I can gladly say that this is so true!
Anivia is one of those characters who is basically a brick wall and in that universe you have a fear of climbing walls...

yeah, always feels like that when you're fighting her.

and I love my birb just for that <3
